label: {{ repeat 3 " " }} {{ repeat %[1]d " " | print "Name" | trunc %[1]d }} {{ repeat 38 " " | print "SubscriptionId" | trunc 38 }} {{ repeat %[2]d " " | print "Tenant" | trunc %[2]d }}
prompt: {{ repeat %[1]d " " }}{{ repeat %[2]d " " | print .Name | trunc %[2]d | green | %[4]s }} | {{ repeat 36 " " | print .Id | trunc 36 | cyan | %[4]s }} | {{ repeat %[3]d " " | print ")" | print .Tenant | print " (" | print .TenantName | trunc %[3]d | faint | %[4]s }}
